# 0.2.0

 - Remove shelljs & switch to child_process `execSync` instead ( drops support of node@v0.10)
 - Drop support for node 0.10 & 0.12

 - update dependencies

#0.0.4 - 20141110

- Increased socket timeout to 500ms

#0.0.3 - 20141105

- Support for Async version
